system.description:
While ice skating, you ignore the effects of Snow and Ice conditions. 
Treat ice skating as being mounted on a horse with a +2 Control Modifier and a SPD of 12 that is incapable of charging or ramming. 
Additionally, making a Control check on ice skates is also a little different:
~REF + Athletics skill + Control Mod. + 1d10

If you fail a Control check on ice skates, roll once on the
Ice Skates Control Loss table.

~1-2 Skid: Slide 1d6 meters sideways in the direction
of travel. If you hit an object, you stop.

~3-4 Stumble: You stumble. Make a DC:15 Athletics
check to stay standing. If you fall you are prone.

~5-6 Stumble: You stumble. Make a DC:20 Athletics
check to stay standing. If you fall you are prone.
